blocks.name: rankung
blocks.content: The rank of the union of two sets. Closed form of ~ rankun . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankung(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c2)), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c2))))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c2)), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c2))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1))), cfv(crnk, cun(c0, cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(crnk, cun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cun(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  uneq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  uneq1d(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1)), cfv(crnk, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk)
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1))), cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c2)), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2d(crnk, cun(c0, cv(hs1)), cun(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  uneq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  uneq2d(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1)), cfv(crnk, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, crnk)
  rankun(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, cv(hs1))), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, cun(c0, c2)), cun(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankung(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(rank `(c0 ⋃ c2))=((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c2)))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (rank `(c0 ⋃ c2))=((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c2)), (rank `(hs0 ⋃ hs1))=((rank ` hs0)⋃(rank ` hs1)), (rank `(c0 ⋃ hs1))=((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` hs1)))
  eqeq12d((rank `(hs0 ⋃ hs1)), ((rank ` hs0)⋃(rank ` hs1)), (rank `(c0 ⋃ hs1)), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` hs1)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(crnk, (hs0 ⋃ hs1), (c0 ⋃ hs1), hs0 = c0)
  uneq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  uneq1d((rank ` hs0), (rank ` hs1), (rank ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crnk)
  eqeq12d((rank `(c0 ⋃ hs1)), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` hs1)), (rank `(c0 ⋃ c2)), ((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c2)), hs1 = c2)
  fveq2d(crnk, (c0 ⋃ hs1), (c0 ⋃ c2), hs1 = c2)
  uneq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  uneq2d((rank ` c0), (rank ` hs1), (rank ` c2), hs1 = c2)
  fveq2(hs1, c2, crnk)
  rankun(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((rank `(c0 ⋃ hs1))=((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w((rank `(c0 ⋃ c2))=((rank ` c0)⋃(rank ` c2)))
}

blocks.name: ranksng
blocks.content: The rank of a singleton. Closed form of ~ ranksn . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ranksng(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(crnk, csn(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cfv(crnk, csn(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, csn(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, csn(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), cfv(crnk, csn(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(crnk, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk)
  suceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c0))
  ranksn(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, csn(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ranksng(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(rank ` { c0 })= suc((rank ` c0)))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (rank ` { c0 })= suc((rank ` c0)), (rank ` { hs0 })= suc((rank ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d((rank ` { hs0 }), suc((rank ` hs0)), (rank ` { c0 }), suc((rank ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(crnk, { hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  syl(hs0 = c0, suc((rank ` hs0))= suc((rank ` c0)), (rank ` hs0)=(rank ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crnk)
  suceq((rank ` hs0), (rank ` c0))
  ranksn(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((rank ` { c0 })= suc((rank ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: rankelg
blocks.content: The membership relation is inherited by the rank function. Closed form of ~ rankel . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankelg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, c0)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, c0))), wi(wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  eleq2d(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk)
  rankel(c2, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(crnk, c2), cfv(crnk, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankelg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(rank ` c2)∈(rank ` c0))
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c0, (rank ` c2)∈(rank ` c0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (c2 ∈ c0 →(rank ` c2)∈(rank ` c0)), (c2 ∈ hs0 →(rank ` c2)∈(rank ` hs0)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, c2 ∈ hs0, (rank ` c2)∈(rank ` hs0), c2 ∈ c0, (rank ` c2)∈(rank ` c0))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, c2)
  eleq2d((rank ` c2), (rank ` hs0), (rank ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crnk)
  rankel(c2, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ∈ c0 →(rank ` c2)∈(rank ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: rankpwg
blocks.content: The rank of a power set. Closed form of ~ rankpw . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankpwg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(crnk, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csuc(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0))), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk)
  suceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), cfv(crnk, c0))
  rankpw(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(crnk, cpw(c0)), csuc(cfv(crnk, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankpwg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(rank ` P(c0))= suc((rank ` c0)))
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (rank ` P(c0))= suc((rank ` c0)), (rank ` P(hs0))= suc((rank ` hs0)))
  eqeq12d((rank ` P(hs0)), suc((rank ` hs0)), (rank ` P(c0)), suc((rank ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(crnk, P(hs0), P(c0), hs0 = c0)
  pweq(hs0, c0)
  syl(hs0 = c0, suc((rank ` hs0))= suc((rank ` c0)), (rank ` hs0)=(rank ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crnk)
  suceq((rank ` hs0), (rank ` c0))
  rankpw(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((rank ` P(c0))= suc((rank ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: rank0
blocks.content: The rank of the empty set is ` (/) ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: rankeq1o
blocks.content: The only set with rank ` 1o ` is the singleton of the empty set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rankeq1o(class c0) {
  |- wb(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)))
} = {
  bitri(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wceq(c0, c1o))
  impbii(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, c1o))
  mpcom(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, c1o), wcel(c0, universe))
  nsyl2(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls))
  neneqd(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls, wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wne(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls), wne(c1o, emptycls))
  neeq1(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o, emptycls)
  fvprc(c0, crnk)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wi(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, c1o)), wi(wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, c1o))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, crnk, c1o)
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1o)
  mpd(wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sylibr(wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wne(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), emptycls), wne(c1o, emptycls))
  1n0()
  neeq1(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o, emptycls)
  necon3bii(cv(hs0), emptycls, cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), emptycls)
  rankeq0(cv(hs0))
  sylbi(wceq(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o)), wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o))
  eqeq1i(cfv(crnk, cv(hs0)), c1o, cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  rankval(hs1, cv(hs0))
  syl(wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o)), wa(wcel(c1o, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))))
  sylib(wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o), wa(wcel(c1o, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))), wcel(c1o, crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  mpbid(wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o), wcel(c1o, crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), wcel(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))))
  sylancr(wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o), wcel(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), wss(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), con0), wne(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls))
  ssrab2(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  necon2ai(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls, wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o))
  mtbiri(wceq(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls), wceq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o), wceq(universe, c1o))
  mto(wceq(universe, c1o), wcel(c1o, c1o))
  elirr(c1o)
  syl5eleq(c1o, c1o, universe, wceq(universe, c1o))
  1oex()
  id(wceq(universe, c1o))
  eqeq1d(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o, universe, wceq(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls))
  syl6eq(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), universe, cint(emptycls), wceq(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls))
  inteq(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))), emptycls)
  int0()
  onint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  eleq1(cint(crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))))), c1o, crab(hs1, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  elrab(hs1, c1o, con0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1o))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1))), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c1o)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1o))
  fveq2d(cr1, csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(c1o), wceq(cv(hs1), c1o))
  suceq(cv(hs1), c1o)
  eqtr4i(cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), cfv(cr1, csuc(c1o)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1o)))
  3eqtrri(cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1o)), cpw(cpw(emptycls)), cpw(csn(emptycls)))
  pweqi(cfv(cr1, c1o), cpw(emptycls))
  3eqtri(cfv(cr1, c1o), cpw(emptycls), cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls)), cpw(cfv(cr1, emptycls)))
  fveq2i(cr1, c1o, csuc(emptycls))
  df-1o()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(emptycls)), cpw(cfv(cr1, emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  0elon()
  r1suc(emptycls)
  pweqi(cfv(cr1, emptycls), emptycls)
  r10()
  pweqi(cpw(emptycls), csn(emptycls))
  pw0()
  pwpw0()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cr1, csuc(c1o)), cpw(cfv(cr1, c1o))), wcel(c1o, con0))
  r1suc(c1o)
  adantl(wcel(c1o, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls))), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls))), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))))
  elpr(cv(hs0), emptycls, csn(emptycls))
  vex(hs0)
  syl6com(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), c1o), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)))
  sylbi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wi(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  df-ne(cv(hs0), emptycls)
  orel1(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)))
  eqcomd(cv(hs0), c1o, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c1o, cv(hs0)), wceq(c1o, csn(emptycls)))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls), c1o)
  syl6eq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o, cfv(crnk, c1o), wceq(c0, c1o))
  fveq2(c0, c1o, crnk)
  mpbi(wceq(cfv(crnk, c1o), c1o), wcel(c1o, cdm(cr1)))
  eleqtrri(c1o, cdm(cr1), con0)
  1on()
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cr1), con0), wf1(cr1, con0, universe))
  r111()
  f1dm(cr1, con0, universe)
  rankonid(c1o)
  eqeq2i(c0, c1o, csn(emptycls))
  df1o2()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c1o), wceq(c0, c1o)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1o)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rankeq1o(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((rank ` c0)= 1o ↔ c0 = { ∅ })
} = {
  bitri((rank ` c0)= 1o, c0 = { ∅ }, c0 = 1o)
  impbii((rank ` c0)= 1o, c0 = 1o)
  mpcom((rank ` c0)= 1o, c0 = 1o, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  nsyl2((rank ` c0)= 1o, c0 ∈ 𝕌, (rank ` c0)= ∅)
  neneqd((rank ` c0), emptycls, (rank ` c0)= 1o)
  mpbiri((rank ` c0)= 1o, (rank ` c0)≠ ∅, 1o ≠ ∅)
  neeq1((rank ` c0), c1o, emptycls)
  fvprc(c0, crnk)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, ((rank ` c0)= 1o → c0 = 1o), ((rank ` hs0)= 1o → hs0 = 1o))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (rank ` hs0)= 1o, hs0 = 1o, (rank ` c0)= 1o, c0 = 1o)
  fveqeq2(hs0, c0, crnk, c1o)
